title: What Lies Ahead for the Art Market
description: Clare McAndrew, founder of Arts Economics, will discuss her mid-year snapshot of the global art market for Art Basel and UBS with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz ahead of a landmark series of New York auctions including the sale of Paul Allen’s US$1 billion collection.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Clare McAndrew, founder of Arts Economics, will discuss her mid-year snapshot of the global art market for Art Basel and UBS with Penta senior writer Abby Schultz ahead of a landmark series of New York auctions including the sale of Paul Allen’s US$1 billion collection.
